sentences.sContent: One of the products of this breakdown is the element chlorine.
sentences.sContent_eng: One of the products of this breakdown is the element chlorine.
sentences.sCn: 这种分解过程的产物之一是元素氯。

sentences.sContent: Direct and some metal composition chlorides of chlorine under the moist circumstance .
sentences.sContent_eng: Direct and some metal composition chlorides of chlorine under the moist circumstance .
sentences.sCn: 氯在潮湿的情况下直接与某些金属合成氯化物。

sentences.sContent: "But years of observation of geochemistry have taught me that caution is wise, " he says, "whether it be for the earlier claims on water or this latest work on chlorine isotopes.
sentences.sContent_eng: "But years of observation of geochemistry have taught me that caution is wise, " he says, "whether it be for the earlier claims on water or this latest work on chlorine isotopes.
sentences.sCn: “但是，多年来对地球化学的观察让我知道谨慎是明智的，”他说，“无论是这次对于氯同位素的研究还是早期对于水的研究都需要谨慎。”

words.tran: 用氯消毒；使氯化；使氯发生作用

trans.tranOther: a greenish-yellow gas with a strong smell that is used to keep the water in swimming pools clean. It is a chemical element: symbol Cl
